name: Car Shooting Zombie
description:
Deadly weapons and large stock of bullets and ammunition are available. Install gunship on the roof top of you 4x4 jeep, drive towards zombies and start firing to kill them.

FEATURES:
- Explore multiple environments, filled with zombies and fun!
- Multiple vehicles to unlock and drive, each with unique abilities. 4x4, 6x6 vehicles, police car, fire truck, monster truck to crush zombies.
- Machine-gun, shotgun, rocket launcher, electric gun to unlock and use against the dead
- Fight Various Types of Zombie
- Drive around freely in Open World design
- Smash zombies with your car, beat bosses, earn cash!
- Upgrade your car and guns and be more effective!
- Test your skills and drive while you can in endless Survival mode!
- Vibrant cartoon graphics
